turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I want to order a coffee to pick up before work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it from Starbucks or Peets?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks, the one on South 3rd Street here in Louisville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have their site pulled up now. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a white chocolate mocha latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot or iced? Or maybe frappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whipped cream or no?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll have whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole milk, 2% milk, nonfat milk, soy, almond, or coconut?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size would you like? They have talle, grande, venti, and trenta

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other special instructions? You could chose to have an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I'll order you a venti iced white chocolate mocha latte with soy milk and an extra shot. Does that sound correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order has been placed and will be read at the 3rd Street Starbucks in about 15 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your phone through text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Enjoy your coffee!
